ai-vb8:14.1_0: And how does a mendicant generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive so that skillful qualities arise?

ai-vb8:16.1_0: And how does a mendicant generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive so that skillful qualities that have arisen remain, are not lost, but increase, mature, and are fulfilled by development?

ai-vb8:16.5_0: That is the perceptions associated with feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-vb8:16.6_0: These are called skillful qualities that have arisen in them.
ai-vb8:16.7_0: And so they generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive so that skillful qualities that have arisen remain, are not lost, but increase, mature, and are completed by development.

ai-vb8:41.1_0: ‘When there are four right efforts, unskillful qualities plaster, how many skillful qualities do they have without confessing?’
ai-vb8:43.1_0: They may be connected with pleasant feeling, painful feeling, and neutral feeling.
ai-vb8:45.1_0: not attached to (but) are favourable to the attachments,
ai-vb8:46.1_0: (They are) not connected with the defilements.
ai-vb8:47.1_0: they may be without thinking, with thinking and reflection, without placing the mind and keeping it connected.
ai-vb8:48.1_0: they may be united with joy, and with equanimity.
ai-vb8:49.1_0: (They are) not given up through vision (of the First Path).
ai-vb8:50.1_0: (They have) roots that are neither to be given up through vision (of the First Path) nor through development (of the rest of the Paths).
ai-vb8:56.1_0: righteous and have a fixed destiny,
ai-vb8:57.1_0: They don’t have Path as their objects, or they may be described in the way that path.

ai-vb8:59.1_0: they may be in the past, future, or present.
ai-vb8:60.1_0: Also they are not to be spoken of as object, they say, “The object is including the object” and “They are not.”
ai-vb8:61.1_0: they may be internal and external.
ai-vb8:63.1_0: (They are) not visible and without impingement.
